TopicTitle: Realism Overhaul No connection problem ... Im clueless on what to do to get connection

Articles.Content: Im trying to send an unmanned probe. Its career mode. I reserrched flight control. I have put a dp10 antenna and a flight dish and all. Still i get no connection. I have not sent a satellite yet in space. It works when i got a manned module but i want to send probe. What the hell am i doing wrong ?

Hi cosmos33,

if you play Realism Overhaul with RemoteTech you need an additional config file for the mission controls. Usually it should be installed with Realism Overhaul but to be sure, please download this file: https://raw.githubusercontent.com/KSP-RO/RealismOverhaul/master/RemoteTech/RemoteTech_Settings.cfg (right click and save as, be sure the name of the file is RemoteTech_Settings.cfg) into your KSPRoot/GameData/RemoteTech.

This should fix your problem.

Have fun with RO and RemoteTech

- Dennis
